title: Halo 2
description: Halo 2 is the sequel to the hugely successful and critically praised Halo: Combat Evolved. In Halo 2 the saga continues as the genetically enhanced super soldier, Master Chief, must defend humankind from the evil Covenant. Transformers: Devastation

system_requirements.Processor: 2 GHz Pentium 4 class processor (or equivalent x64)
system_requirements.Graphics Card: A DirectX 9 compatible card with WDDM driver, Pixel Shader 2.0/32BPP, and at least NVIDIA 6000 or ATI x700 or above
